member.summary: Releases any unmanaged resources used by the subscription.

member.summary: Returns the filters applied by the server to any item results returned to the client.

member.summary: Sets the filters applied by the server to any item results returned to the client.
member.param: A bit mask indicating which fields should be returned in any item results.

member.summary: Returns the current state of the subscription.
member.returns: The current state of the subscription.

member.summary: Changes the state of a subscription.
member.param: A bit mask that indicates which elements of the subscription state are changing.
The new subscription state.
member.returns: The actual subscption state after applying the changes.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Subscription.AddItems(Opc.Da.Item[])
member.summary: Adds items to the subscription.
member.param: The set of items to add to the subscription.
member.returns: The results of the add item operation for each item.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Subscription.ModifyItems(System.Int32,Opc.Da.Item[])
member.summary: Modifies the state of items in the subscription
member.param: Specifies which item state parameters are being modified.
The new state for each item.
member.returns: The results of the modify item operation for each item.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Subscription.RemoveItems(Opc.ItemIdentifier[])
member.summary: Removes items from the subscription.
member.param: The identifiers (i.e. server handles) for the items being removed.
member.returns: The results of the remove item operation for each item.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Subscription.Read(Opc.Da.Item[])
member.summary: Reads the values for a set of items in the subscription.
member.param: The identifiers (i.e. server handles) for the items being read.
member.returns: The value for each of items.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Subscription.Write(Opc.Da.ItemValue[])
member.summary: Writes the value, quality and timestamp for a set of items in the subscription.
member.param: The item values to write.
member.returns: The results of the write operation for each item.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Subscription.Read(Opc.Da.Item[],System.Object,Opc.Da.ReadCompleteEventHandler,Opc.IRequest@)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous read operation for a set of items.
member.param: The set of items to read (must include the server handle).
An identifier for the request assigned by the caller.
A delegate used to receive notifications when the request completes.
An object that contains the state of the request (used to cancel the request).
member.returns: A set of results containing any errors encountered when the server validated the items.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Subscription.Write(Opc.Da.ItemValue[],System.Object,Opc.Da.WriteCompleteEventHandler,Opc.IRequest@)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous write operation for a set of items.
member.param: The set of item values to write (must include the server handle).
An identifier for the request assigned by the caller.
A delegate used to receive notifications when the request completes.
An object that contains the state of the request (used to cancel the request).
member.returns: A set of results containing any errors encountered when the server validated the items.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Subscription.Cancel(Opc.IRequest,Opc.Da.CancelCompleteEventHandler)
member.summary: Cancels an asynchronous read or write operation.
member.param: The object returned from the BeginRead or BeginWrite request.
The function to invoke when the cancel completes.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Subscription.Refresh
member.summary: Causes the server to send a data changed notification for all active items.

member.summary: Causes the server to send a data changed notification for all active items.
member.param: An identifier for the request assigned by the caller.
An object that contains the state of the request (used to cancel the request).
member.returns: A set of results containing any errors encountered when the server validated the items.

member.name: T:OpcXml.Da.Server
member.summary: An in-process wrapper for a remote OPC XML-DA server (not thread safe).

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the object.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.Dispose
member.summary: This must be called explicitly by clients to ensure the COM server is released.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.Initialize(Opc.URL,Opc.ConnectData)
member.summary: Connects to the server with the specified URL and credentials.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.Uninitialize
member.summary: Disconnects from the server and releases all network resources.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.GetLocale
member.summary: The locale used in any error messages or results returned to the client.
member.returns: The locale name in the format "[languagecode]-[country/regioncode]".

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.SetLocale(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the locale used in any error messages or results returned to the client.
member.param: The locale name in the format "[languagecode]-[country/regioncode]".
member.returns: A locale that the server supports and is the best match for the requested locale.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.GetSupportedLocales
member.summary: Returns the locales supported by the server
member.remarks: The first element in the array must be the default locale for the server.
member.returns: An array of locales with the format "[languagecode]-[country/regioncode]".

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.GetErrorText(System.String,Opc.ResultID)
member.summary: Returns the localized text for the specified result code.
member.param: The locale name in the format "[languagecode]-[country/regioncode]".
The result code identifier.
member.returns: A message localized for the best match for the requested locale.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.GetResultFilters
member.summary: Returns the filters applied by the server to any item results returned to the client.
member.returns: A bit mask indicating which fields should be returned in any item results.

member.summary: Sets the filters applied by the server to any item results returned to the client.
member.param: A bit mask indicating which fields should be returned in any item results.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.GetStatus
member.summary: Returns the current server status.
member.returns: The current server status.

member.summary: Reads the current values for a set of items.
member.param: The set of items to read.
member.returns: The results of the read operation for each item.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.Write(Opc.Da.ItemValue[])
member.summary: Writes the value, quality and timestamp for a set of items.
member.param: The set of item values to write.
member.returns: The results of the write operation for each item.

member.summary: Creates a new subscription.
member.param: The initial state of the subscription.
member.returns: The new subscription object.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.CancelSubscription(Opc.Da.ISubscription)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the appropriate subcription object.
member.param: The remote subscription object.

member.name: M:OpcXml.Da.Server.Browse(Opc.ItemIdentifier,Opc.Da.BrowseFilters,Opc.Da.BrowsePosition@)
member.summary: Fetches the children of a branch that meet the filter criteria.
member.param: The identifier of branch which is the target of the search.
The filters to use to limit the set of child elements returned.
An object used to continue a browse that could not be completed.
member.returns: The set of elements found.

member.summary: Continues a browse operation with previously specified search criteria.

member.returns: The set of elements found.

member.summary: Returns the item properties for a set of items.

A list of properties to fetch for each item.
Whether the property values should be returned with the properties.
member.returns: A list of properties for each item.

member.summary: The autogenerated proxy object for the XML-DA 1.0 web service.
